description: Massive youth protests have erupted across the country, with the students demanding free university education. Their argument revolves around education being a fundamental human right, not a privilege reserved for the affluent. The clamour is gaining support from the public, significantly pressuring our party to respond. How should we address this growing social issue?

options.description: Let's make university education free for all!.
Our national budget simply can't sustain such an expense.
Offering more need-based scholarships might be a more realistic approach.

title: Free University Education
